title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for January 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for January 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis. The episodes from January 6 to January 10, 2025 will celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Wheel of Fortune, meaning that a few of the puzzles will likely be themed around the game show in some of the way. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Jill & Mike Hampton, Lori & Robert Lambert, and Danielle Williams & Adam Bencan. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 6. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, January 6, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK STUDY [Person] Tossup #1 – A LANDMARK ACHIEVEMENT [Person] Tossup #2 – CHERRY TURNOVER [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #1 – LIGHTING LOTS OF CANDLES [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #2 – A FLASH IN THE PAN PIZZA [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – IS THE WEATHER ALWAYS GOOD? [Phrase] Tossup #3 – BUSINESS TRIP [Thing] Tossup #4 – CAMPING TRIP [Thing] Tossup #5 – GUILT TRIP [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – CRACKING YOUR KNUCKLES [Pet Peeve] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Friday, January 3: Bonus Round Puzzle – SO MUCH IN COMMON [Phrase] Tossup #1 – HOPEFUL BEGINNINGS [Things] Tossup #2 – RACQUETBALL [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – PEACE, PROSPERITY & PROMISES [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – NOBODY DOES IT BETTER [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #3 – THE HOTTEST SHOW IN TOWN [Showbiz] Tossup #3 – WAITING IN LINE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – CROSSING THE LINE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – LINE DANCING [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – POPCORN POPPER [In The Kitchen] Regular Puzzle #5 – ARE YOU GONNA GO MY WAY? [Song Lyrics] Fan Friday – Ireland The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 10 episode. Wheel of Fortune also has several contests this month, including the ability to win a trip to Puerto Rico on Instagram and a Holland America cruise giveaway for a 7-day trip for two for a contest that runs from January 13 to 17. Watchers can also win $10,000 by entering the My$tery Wedge contest and entering with their SPIN ID.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis.

The episodes from January 6 to January 10, 2025 will celebrate the 50th Anniversary of Wheel of Fortune, meaning that a few of the puzzles will likely be themed around the game show in some of the way. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three pairs of contestants: Jill & Mike Hampton, Lori & Robert Lambert, and Danielle Williams & Adam Bencan. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 6.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, January 6, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK STUDY [Person]
  • Tossup #1 – A LANDMARK ACHIEVEMENT [Person]
  • Tossup #2 – CHERRY TURNOVER [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – LIGHTING LOTS OF CANDLES [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – A FLASH IN THE PAN PIZZA [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – IS THE WEATHER ALWAYS GOOD? [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – BUSINESS TRIP [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – CAMPING TRIP [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – GUILT TRIP [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – CRACKING YOUR KNUCKLES [Pet Peeve]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Friday, January 3:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – SO MUCH IN COMMON [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – HOPEFUL BEGINNINGS [Things]
  • Tossup #2 – RACQUETBALL [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – PEACE, PROSPERITY & PROMISES [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – NOBODY DOES IT BETTER [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – THE HOTTEST SHOW IN TOWN [Showbiz]
  • Tossup #3 – WAITING IN LINE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – CROSSING THE LINE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – LINE DANCING [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – POPCORN POPPER [In The Kitchen]
  • Regular Puzzle #5 – ARE YOU GONNA GO MY WAY? [Song Lyrics]
  • Fan Friday – Ireland

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 10 episode.

Wheel of Fortune also has several contests this month, including the ability to win a trip to Puerto Rico on Instagram and a Holland America cruise giveaway for a 7-day trip for two for a contest that runs from January 13 to 17. Watchers can also win $10,000 by entering the My$tery Wedge contest and entering with their SPIN ID.
